name: Somewhere
content: Do you know why your heart stands still
Do you know what you’re looking for
Do you know why you’re breaking hearts
Why you’re ending up back at the start
Do you know why you’re waking up
The more that we know the less we know
I know  i know  i know  i know
Do you know what you’re fighting for
Do you know why you wake at night
Do you know what you really love
The more that we know the less we know
I know  i know  i know  i know
Do you know why your heart stands still
Do you know what you’re waiting for
Do you know what your limits are
Are you reaching out with open arms
Do you know all your inner truths
The more that we know the less we know
I know  i know  i know  i know
I know  i know  i know  i know
